title: In Game Issue - Random Mini dc's
body: During game every few minutes I am unable to see minions die, abilities, and autoattacks. This only occurs for about 5 seconds, 10 seconds at max and then I can play normally. It occurs every 2-3 minutes and is rather annoying to deal with as during teamfights I am unable to do much. Can anyone give me any suggestion how to fix this?

replies.body:
Hey GoldenPandaWars,

If you're having connection issues, I strongly urge you to try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article.
